ruling: - You can equip a monster to [[Allure Queen LV3]] that is having its Level reduced to 3 or lower by an effect, like [[Demotion]].

- If [[Book of Moon]] is chained to the activation of [[Allure Queen LV3]]'s effect to turn the "Allure Queen" face-down, then the monster that was targeted is destroyed. It cannot be equipped to a face-down monster.
